title: Taking an inactive account's summoner name
body: So I was wondering what is the period of time an account needs to be inactive for before its deactivated? as I wanted the summoner of an account that hasn't played any games since 2014 and wanted to know when it would be available.

replies.body: If you look up the account's name [here](http://lolnamecheck.jj.ai/) it will tell you exactly how long is left before you can take the name :D

Will there be a possibility for us to have multiple names to one single account? IE a drop down list to pick ones you have in the pocket

I got bucket of money happy to pocket all names I want
Being able to hoard names doesn't sound like it would be a popular idea, so I doubt Riot would be into it. Then again, nothing official has been said about this issue, so it's possible I'm wrong :P

A bit off-topic: Is it also possible to get a list of your past names, a bit like how Steam does it. Yeah I know Riot gave us the friend-note mechanics which is cool, but it would be cooler if you could see what other names a player (who may or may not be on your friend list) has taken before their current one. 

Idk, just a suggestion.

Yeah I also think it would be pretty cool to know other people's summoner names. From what I understand, OP.GG actually used to give past summoner names for any player, but the API rules changed for "privacy reasons" and it wasn't allowed anymore :(

I see no reason why you shouldn't be able to have a detailed history of your own name changes though. Maybe a feature for the new client?
